data.meta_description: An expansive collection of images related to experiences of the U.S. Civil War
data.text:
Experiences of the U.S. Civil War image gallery

by Smarthistory

Use these images to support discussion and research on the Experiences of the U.S. Civil War. Build on the content already included in the essays and videos and refer to the discussion questions related to this theme to frame your inquiry.

Cite this page as: Smarthistory, "Experiences of the U.S. Civil War image gallery," in Smarthistory, March 20, 2022, accessed August 26, 2024, https://smarthistory.org/seeing-america-2/civil-war-in-art/experiences-of-the-war-slideshow/.
